New bottle. New energy. New year. Welcome to 2021. DeLeón Tequila.... and it’s owned by a Black man. #deleontequila

I’m gonna assume you didn’t know Diddy owned a tequila before this post, but now that you know follow, and let’s make a toast. I promise I wasn’t even trying to rhyme. Creative direction for DeLeón Tequila. Soundtrack c/o Bilal. https://t.co/dc6XUXcYzi
@Diddy @DeLeonTequila Didn’t know you owned this! One of the best tequilas I’ve had.

Congrats to Christopher “Notorious B.I.G.” Wallace.

My favorite rapper. 🙏🏿 https://t.co/Eczbfq0Hib

Looking at #BIG was like looking into the future. He was a superstar ahead of his time who took Hip Hop to heights nobody thought possible.
 
He had the charisma, the style, the wordplay, & the intangible factors you could never describe on paper. #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/Ofj7FQY9F3

#BIG inspired all artists and brought the world together. He made Hip Hop prime time. He showed how beautiful and powerful we are together.
 
I hope this moment inspires us all to dream BIG, reach for the stars and always know the SKY IS THE LIMIT. 👑 #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/wH4z3QXNAS
Thank you to the @RockHall for immortalizing the best to ever do it and acknowledging his contributions to music. #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/MaPjOWRjp4
👑 #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/4Z2VLgTH2P

Two undeniably classic albums, unforgettable guest verses, and a DNA that you can find in just about any rapper who matters today. Rappers who were just babies when BIG was taken from us, still flip and interpolate his lyrics.

“Looking back on Ready To Die and the age of exuberance born from the Bad Boy lifestyle, The Notorious B.I.G. made an album that embodied what poet Lenore Kandel expressed when she wrote, “I will not wither in the blaze of time, but prove myself a phoenix”

Celebrating B.I.G.! https://t.co/x5xcJ9GfGY
YOU DID IT!!!!!!! #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/x8mG8YnAgM
YOU DID IT BIG!!! #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/PF9THehVPr
BK 🗣🗣 #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/hSF6AMyNUq

YOU DID IT BIGGIE! 

Congrats to #TheNotoriousBIG for officially being inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame!!! 👏🏿🏆 

Tune into a special show tonight to watch the legacy he left behind on IG LIVE 👉🏿 @DJClarkKent 6p ET, @DJ_DNICE 9p ET. #BIGGIEHOF https://t.co/puiho8hL4T
If you heard a Biggie song once, you could damn near recite the song word-for-word on the second listen. He had this ability to rule commercial radio, but never lose his underground appeal.

Shout to Brooklyn. I’ve been thinking about this for a couple of days, so this gonna be A THREAD. Shout to @revolttv too. Biggie making it to the @RockHall is huge when you think about how it all started for him
THE GREATEST RAPPER OF ALL TIME IS GETTING INDUCTED INTO THE ROCK & ROLL HALL OF FAME TONIGHT!!!!!!!!! YOU DID IT B.I.G.!!!! #BIGGIEHOF
